TESTE 1 
SELECT * FROM peopleflowtotals WHERE 
camera_id in (148782,155266,155325)
AND created_at BETWEEN '2026-01-05' AND '2026-01-06';
--5160	2026-01-05 15:00:00	148782	1370	1241	1
--5161	2026-01-05 15:00:00	155266	1052	1032	1
--5163	2026-01-05 15:00:00	155325	368	358	1
DELETE FROM peopleflowtotals WHERE id in (5160,5161,5163);
SELECT * FROM peopleflowtotals WHERE 
camera_id in (148782,155266,155325)
AND created_at BETWEEN '2026-01-05' AND '2026-01-06'
--5448	2026-01-05 15:00:00	148782	1290	1273	1
--35449	2026-01-05 15:00:00	155266	1071	1078	1
--35450	2026-01-05 15:00:00	155325	362	363	1

TESTE 2
SELECT * FROM peopleflowtotals WHERE id IN (5130,5148,5143);
--5130	2026-01-05 10:00:00	148782	668	650	1
--5143	2026-01-05 12:00:00	155266	1110	1271	1
--5148	2026-01-05 13:00:00	148782	1426	1438	1
DELETE FROM peopleflowtotals WHERE id IN (5130,5148,5143);
--35448	2026-01-05 10:00:00	148782	656	656	1
--35449	2026-01-05 13:00:00	148782	1506	1515	1
--35450	2026-01-05 12:00:00	155266	1227	1227	1

TESTE 3
SELECT * FROM peopleflowtotals WHERE 
camera_id in (155266)
AND created_at BETWEEN '2026-01-05' AND '2026-01-06'
ORDER BY created_at;
35451	2026-01-05 09:00:00	155266	465	450	1
UPDATE peopleflowtotals SET total_inside=30  WHERE id=35451
35451	2026-01-05 09:00:00	155266	30	450	1
resultou
35452	2026-01-05 09:00:00	155266	461	450	1

TESTE 4 
SELECT * FROM peopleflowtotals WHERE 
created_at BETWEEN '2026-01-05 10:00:00' AND '2026-01-05 10:59:59'
ORDER BY created_at;
5131	2026-01-05 10:00:00	155266	483	470	1
5132	2026-01-05 10:00:00	155310	449	440	1
5133	2026-01-05 10:00:00	155325	203	197	1
5134	2026-01-05 10:00:00	155542	459	490	1
5135	2026-01-05 10:00:00	155681	135	139	1
35448	2026-01-05 10:00:00	148782	656	656	1
DELETE FROM peopleflowtotals WHERE 
created_at BETWEEN '2026-01-05 10:00:00' AND '2026-01-05 10:59:59'
resultado com historico
35453	2026-01-05 10:00:00	148782	656	656	1
35454	2026-01-05 10:00:00	155266	452	442	1
35455	2026-01-05 10:00:00	155310	459	460	1
35456	2026-01-05 10:00:00	155325	201	204	1
35457	2026-01-05 10:00:00	155542	463	457	1
35458	2026-01-05 10:00:00	155681	148	160	1
